thread.section_title: BOSS LASER Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BOSS LASER | bosslaser.com
thread.title: David

author: David
title: David
text:
I have purchased a 24x36 hp 150w laser about one and a half years ago. The outside housing was damaged slightly from shipping . I took pictures of the damage and sent to Boss. There were no questions asks. They had new parts at my door within 2 weeks. The technical support I needed several times was fast. All the questions and issues I had were answered within the hour. Even after a year and a half I needed tech support again. I had a plate under led screen come out, took a few pics and sent to Boss and they sent pics back on how to fix the issue. Resolved in less than 30 min. Once again I want to thank the entire team at Bosslaser.
Dave
Pennsylvania
